title: Episode 238: 25 or 70 (Feat. Loni Love and Chloe Hilliard)
itunes:title: Episode 238: 25 or 70 (Feat. Loni Love and Chloe Hilliard)
description:
Comedians/Hosts/Authors Loni Love and Chloe Hilliard join the ladies of Lip Service this week and discuss dating both young and old, family therapy, fucking fans, and much more. Loni breaks down her ideal 20 minutes, while Chloe walks you through taking a dick thats probably too big. Shouts to Carolina Bermudez of KTU and Aviane for joining us as special guest hosts...enjoy!
